oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Advertisement from Nashville City Directory, 1871
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A page of advertisement from the 1871 Nashville City Directory featuring the commercial businesses: Carrick, Hollins & Co. “dealers in boots, shoes, and hats,” located at No. 3 Nashville Inn Block; Phillips, Buttorff & Co., No. 22 North College Street; Saloon & Restaurant, J.C. Austin and J. E. Austin, Proprietors; and Warren & Moore, Carpenters & Builders, No. 55 South High Street. Forms part of Nashville City Directory Collection, Metro Archives. 1 digital image.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Carrick, Hollins & Co. (Nashville, Tenn.); Buttorff & Co. (Nashville, Tenn.); Saloon & Restaurant (Nashville, Tenn.); Warren & Moore (Nashville, Tenn.)
